minetest.info.privileges.link: For administration functions, please see commands here:
minetest.invitation.cc.label: Recipients:
minetest.invitation.default.body.1:
Hello,

You are invited to participate in building a Minetest world "
minetest.invitation.default.body.2:
". Please follow these steps:

How to download the Minetest software from my computer ?

If you have already used Minetest on this computer, you can skip to the part: How do I join a world I have been invited to?
  1. Click on this link: then on the one corresponding to your system to download the Minetest software zip archive on your computer
  2. Go to your file explorer > Downloads and find the archive you just downloaded which has the name like 'minetest-x-win64'
  3. Right click and select 'Extract all'
  4. Choose the folder location by clicking 'Browse... ' and by selecting for example 'Desktop' so that the folder containing the Minetest software is found on the desktop of your computer. You can validate by clicking on 'Select a folder' then 'Extract'
  5. Wait until the download is complete'
  6. Once finished, continue to the next step

How to open Minetest from a computer or Android phone ?
  1. Go to your desktop, open the folder named like 'minetest-x-win64'
  2. Enter the following folders: 'minetest-x-win64' > 'bin' then you will find a 'minetest' file illustrated by the logo of the application, open it
  3. A new window has opened: you access Minetest
  4. Click on the 'Join a game' tab
  5. If you're using an Android phone, click on the Join Game tab
  6. To join a world you have been invited to, continue to the next step

How do I join a world I have been invited to?



Enter the world information in the various boxes provided
